Media Internship at Edinburgh Napier University

I spent my summer as a media intern at my University producing content for the Marketing & Communications Department.

During this time, I developed videos to advertise their courses, featuring interviews and motion infographics to do this.

I also filmed some events, including a summer Graduation which involved capturing the dayâ€™s atmosphere in a short video suitable for social media. This was edited together with sound, titles and motion graphics with a quick turn around of three days.
